In Canada, cod remain scarce despite ban

20 years after the Newfoundland cod fishery closed, the fish have not come back and a way of life is gone. Local scientists and fishermen fear it is an omen. (Boston Globe)

News

2 trains collide in Poland killing 15

Two trains running on the same track collided head-on in the southern town of Szczekociny late Saturday, leaving 15 people dead and 56 injured -- the country's worst train disaster in more than two decades.

A look at Google's privacy policy

Google has begun integrating all the information it collects about users into a single privacy policy. This is raising concerns among privacy advocates and shrugs from people who prefer the convenience over their personal data.
